com.xaguzman.artemiscommons.managers

Class AssetManager<A extends com.artemis.Component,B extends com.artemis.Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.Manager
        • com.xaguzman.artemiscommons.managers.AssetManager<A,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Identifying metadata component type.
    B - Asset reference component type (typically transient).

    public abstract class AssetManager<A extends com.artemis.Component,B extends com.artemis.Component>
extends com.artemis.Manager
    Manages reference components to assets. - Adds asset reference component to entities with metadata component. - Reloads asset reference if removed. - Removes asset reference when metadata component is removed.
